Author: algorthin
Text: I had an outpatient therapist who used to be the director at Renfrew.   The best advice I was given when I was going inpatient is to give yourself some blinders. You have to be there for you. Don't let your eating disorder learn from other people in the unit. When I was inpatient I was one of the only people that was a first timer there. Please just focus on yourself.

Author: notracisthasblackcat
Text: Oh shit Renfrew, I've heard stories about that place. It's hardcore and I haven't heard positive things
